name: The Pairing - Tower Game
description:
The Pairing - Tower Game

This is one half of the #TwoGamesjam2021 submission "The Pairing", which you can play over here.

Oy, Bravest Knight

Thou art the northern star of the round table - but now thy swift, daring and dashing heart thou must carry forth to rescue the fair Princess Zabia and the alliances of thine Great Kingdom!

Control Key Movement Left/Right ArrowsJumpingUp/Down ArrowsReset Level Escape Credits

Thanks to Antti Luode for the musical piece "Aloude Tunefish" 🤍
